title: Why were most slaves black people? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no why because the content of your question is based on a stereotype : the Negro for European slavers or the abeed for Arab slavers. As someone put it : The stereotype from the Establishment consensus history is of the Muslim slaver herding chained Blacks through the desert. In fact, for seven hundred years, until the fall of Muslim Spain, those being herded were first and foremost overwhelmingly White. Escape from North Africa and the Middle East was almost impossible and those White slaves who were caught trying to flee were punished by having their noses and ears cut off or worse. True be told, stereotypes are exaggerations based on actual facts but they only tell part of the story or they hide the very beginning of the story. The etymology of the word slave (a degraded servant or a perpetual serf) hints at a large scale slave trade that took place in the Middle Ages and long after. The very word slave comes from the Slavs, a European ethnic group, because they were once the vast majority of the people enslaved. It went from Slavs to slaves. White slavery meaning human trafficking for the purpose of prostitution comes from a time when European women were commodifed and sold on Islamic slave markets. Circassian women, Slavic women, were in high demand as they were considered trophy wives and preferred breeding partners. Whites were enslaved in Africa under different names and as early as the Carthaginian Empire : the Punic slaves, the Janissaries, the Barbary slaves, the Saqaliba, the Morean slaves etc. There were Whites enslaved as deep as Northern Cameroun by Shuwa Arabs and as far as Zanzibar where slave women of European origin (Slavs, Greeks etc) were sold to wealthy Zanzibari merchants. The white slave trade of the Moors lasted at least a thousand years until the early 20th with the capture of the last Riff pirate. Whites were sold on slave markets in North Africa as late as the 19th. The Sale slave market of Morocco is well known for that. Barbary pirates raided for white slaves as far as Iceland and the American high seas. European countries and the USA paid tons of money ransoming European and American captives in northwestern Africa (the Barbary states). But white slavery in Africa is a taboo subject. The extraordinary life of British Admiral Sidney Smith who founded a movement to liberate all the Whites enslaved in Africa has been swept under the carpet of history. Not only white slavery in Africa is taboo but other slave trades in Asia or even pre-columbian America are barely covered in history textbooks. Asia is the most populous continent. It is common sense to assume that most slaves in history or today are Asians and it is the truth. Blacks are a race of slaves is a constant historical narrative in the West but others were also slaves and are still slaves, including in Europe. Ukraine has more than 400 000 modern day slaves.
